title: KVS, NVS application deadline extended: Check details and direct link to apply here
description: The KVS and NVS recruitment 2025 application deadline has been extended to December 11, giving candidates more time to apply for 14,967 teaching and non-teaching posts. The nationwide drive covers key roles across both school systems. Applicants must complete…
